attributes.action: Encourage schools to stop giving students homework
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children work for 6-7 hours a day in school and time at home should be used to relax. Adults work on average 8 hours a day without the extra burden of work to take home. Kids will be happier and will be less tired, this will mean the work they do in school will be better quality.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/stop-homeworks/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
